content: पिशुन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [पिश्-उनच् किच्च; <ls>Uṇ. 3. 55</ls>] {@--1@} ({%a%}) Indicating, manifesting, evincing, displaying, indicative of; शत्रूणामनिशं विनाशपिशुनः <ls>Śi. 1. 75</ls>; तुल्यानुरागपिशुनं <ls>V. 2. 14</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 53</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 97.</ls> ({%b%}) Memorable for, commemorating; क्षेत्रं क्षत्रप्रधनपिशुनं कौरवं तद्भजेथाः <ls>Me. 48.</ls> {@--2@} Slanderous, back-biting, calumniating; पिशुनजनं खलु बिभ्रति क्षितींद्राः <ls>Bv. 1. 74.</ls> {@--3@} Betraying, treacherous. {@--4@} Harsh, cruel, unkind. {@--5@} Wicked, malicious, malignant. {@--6@} Low, vile, contemptible. {@--7@} Foolish, stupid. --नः {@--1@} A slanderer, back-biter, tale-bearer, base informer, traitor, calumniator; <ls>H. 1. 135</ls>, <ls>Pt. 1. 304</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 161.</ls> {@--2@} Cotton. {@--3@} An epithet of <ls>Nārada.</ls> {@--4@} A crow. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of a goblin (said to be dangerous to pregnant women). --नं {@--1@} Betraying. {@--2@} Saffron.
